text: Hi Marnie, I hope you are doing well. I'm planning to apply for the internship in a couple of days and I was wondering if by any chance you know whom to address the cover letter to make it more personal? Also, I know I asked before but just to confirm, do you mind if I reference you in my letter? Thank you in advance:)

Hello sorry just saw this, yes feel free to reference me. I unfortunately have no idea who is looking after the internship. I will ask around but it is a big place, so may not get an answer quickly. Good luck!
